sentences.sentence: It is called an " Echinoderm", which means it is spiny-skinned.
sentences.translation: 它是一种棘皮类动物，身上皮肤长满刺。

sentences.sentence: Echinoid: an echinoderm of the class echinoidea which includes the sand dollars and sea urchins.
sentences.translation: 海胆：一种属于海胆纲的棘皮动物，包括沙钱和海胆。

sentences.sentence: Sea cucumber is a kind of echinoderm animal, is one of the rare seafood with high protein, low fat, low cholesterol.
sentences.translation: 海参是一种棘皮动物，是高蛋白、低脂肪、低胆固醇的名贵海味之一。
